title: Issue Form 1099-NEC to a Contractor
description: A business paid a consultant $5,000 during the year and needs to issue them a Form 1099-NEC.

tasks.description: Gather the contractor's name, address, and Taxpayer Identification Number (TIN) from their Form W-9.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent has all the necessary payee information.

tasks.description: Determine the total amount paid to the contractor during the calendar year.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent confirms the total payment was $5,000.

tasks.description: Prepare Form 1099-NEC with the payment information and provide it to the contractor.
